column2: As soon as we were quite ready, M. Fridriksson advanced, and by way of farewell, called after me in the words of Virgil--words which appeared to have been made for us, travelers starting for an uncertain destination:
column3: As soon as we were quite ready, m Fridriksson advanced, and by way of farewell, called after me in the words of Virgil-words which appeared to have been made for us, travelers starting for an uncertain destination:

column2: Et quacunque viam dederit fortuna sequamur.
column3: Et quacunque viam dederit fortuna sequamur.

column2: ("And whichsoever way thou goest, may fortune follow!")
column3: ("And whichsoever way thou goest, may fortune follow!")

column2: OUR START--WE MEET WITH ADVENTURES BY THE WAY
column3: OUR START-WE MEET WITH ADVENTURES BY THE WAY

column2: The weather was overcast but settled, when we commenced our adventurous and perilous journey.
column3: The weather was overcast but settled, when we commenced our adventurous and perilous journey.

column2: We had neither to fear fatiguing heat nor drenching rain.
column3: We had neither to fear fatiguing heat nor drenching rain.

column2: It was, in fact, real tourist weather.
column3: It was, in fact, real tourist weather.

column2: As there was nothing I liked better than horse exercise, the pleasure of riding through an unknown country caused the early part of our enterprise to be particularly agreeable to me.
column3: As there was nothing I liked better than horse exercise, the pleasure of riding through an unknown country caused the early part of our enterprise to be particularly agreeable to me.

column2: I began to enjoy the exhilarating delight of traveling, a life of desire, gratification and liberty.
column3: I began to enjoy the exhilarating delight of traveling, a life of desire, gratification and liberty.

column2: The truth is, that my spirits rose so rapidly, that I began to be indifferent to what had once appeared to be a terrible journey.

column2: After all, I said to myself, "what do I risk?
column3: After all, I said to myself, "what do I risk?
